page.title: Contact Us
page.subtitle: Get in touch with our property management experts. We're here to help you maximize your property investment.

form.title: Send us a message
form.description: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
form.sectionDescription: Ready to discuss your property management needs? Send us a message and we'll respond within 24 hours.
form.name: Full Name
form.subject: Subject
form.subjectPlaceholder: What can we help you with?
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your property management needs...
form.consentText: I consent to being contacted about my inquiry
form.privacyNotice: We respect your privacy and will never share your information with third parties.
form.successMessage: Thank you for your message. We'll get back to you within 24 hours.
form.responseTime: We typically respond within 2-4 hours during business hours.
form.submitError: Failed to send message. Please try again.

info.sectionDescription: Multiple ways to reach us. Choose what works best for you.

phone.label: Phone
phone.description: Call us directly for immediate assistance

email.label: Email
email.description: Send us an email for detailed inquiries

whatsapp.label: WhatsApp
whatsapp.description: Message us on WhatsApp for quick responses

address.label: Office Address
address.description: Visit our office for in-person consultations

info.businessHoursDescription: Our team is available during these hours for immediate assistance.
info.appointmentDescription: Schedule a meeting outside business hours by calling ahead.

emergency.title: Emergency Contact
emergency.description: For urgent property issues outside business hours

location.title: Our Location
location.description: Find us in the heart of Algiers business district

directions.publicTransportDetails: Metro Line 1, Business District Station (5 min walk)
directions.parkingDetails: Free parking available in building garage

reasons.title: How Can We Help?
reasons.description: Common reasons our clients contact us

process.title: Our Response Process
process.description: Here's what happens after you contact us

step1.title: We Receive Your Message
step1.description: Your inquiry is immediately logged and assigned to the right specialist

step2.title: Initial Response
step2.description: We acknowledge your message and provide initial guidance

step3.title: Detailed Follow-up
step3.description: Our specialist contacts you with a detailed response and next steps

q1.question: How quickly do you respond to inquiries?
q1.answer: We respond to all inquiries within 24 hours, typically within 2-4 hours during business hours.

q2.question: Do you offer free consultations?
q2.answer: Yes, we offer free initial consultations to discuss your property management needs and how we can help.

q3.question: What areas do you serve?
q3.answer: We primarily serve the Algiers metropolitan area and surrounding regions. Contact us to confirm service in your area.

q4.question: Can I schedule a meeting outside business hours?
q4.answer: Yes, we can arrange meetings outside regular hours by appointment. Please call ahead to schedule.

form.title: Property Inquiry
form.description: Interested in this property? Get in touch with us for more information.
form.descriptionWithProperty: Interested in {property}? Get in touch with us for more information.
form.name: Full Name
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us more about your requirements, questions, or specific needs...
form.consentText: I consent to being contacted about this property inquiry
form.privacyNotice: Your information is secure and will only be used to respond to your inquiry.
form.successMessage: Thank you for your interest. We'll contact you soon with more information about this property.
form.responseTime: Our property specialists typically respond within 2-4 hours.
form.submitError: Failed to send inquiry. Please try again.

form.title: Service Inquiry
form.description: Tell us about your property management needs and we'll provide a customized solution.
form.name: Full Name
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your specific requirements, challenges, or goals...
form.consentText: I consent to being contacted about my service inquiry
form.privacyNotice: Your information is secure and will only be used to provide you with service information.
form.successMessage: Thank you for your interest in our services. We'll contact you soon with a customized proposal.
form.responseTime: Our service specialists typically respond within 4-6 hours with a detailed proposal.
form.submitError: Failed to send service inquiry. Please try again.

form.title: Request a Callback
form.description: Leave your number and we'll call you back at your preferred time.
form.name: Full Name
form.consentText: I consent to being called at the provided number
form.privacyNotice: We will only use your number to call you back about your inquiry.
form.successMessage: Thank you! We'll call you back at your preferred time.
form.callbackTime: You can expect our call within 2-4 hours during business hours.
